title: What about if i own rare 2010 Urf The Manatee Warwick skin ? Wil i get some rare border ??!!!

replies.body: I don't have any information on this or specific contents of the essence store.  :/  You should share your feedback on the [Ask Riot/IP page](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/riot-pls-leveling-ip-and-rewards/) so our devs can consider it!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1Eo8ZXxL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-01T20:08:38.052+0000)
>
> I don't have any information on this or specific contents of the essence store.  :/  You should share your feedback on the [Ask Riot/IP page](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/riot-pls-leveling-ip-and-rewards/) so our devs can consider it!

Any chance you could poke the devs about it? Doesn't seem like they're replying to the question being raised on the Ask Riot page you linked to.
Afraid not, player support doesn't have visibility over dev stuff.  I'm sure they're receiving a lot of feedback, give them a chance to comb over and consider all things!
